meanings.definition: not intended to gain favor or approval
meanings.sent1: Her uningratiating remarks did not please the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The uningratiating behavior of the new student made it hard for others to warm up to them.
meanings.sent3: The uningratiating cat refused to purr even when offered treats.
meanings.sent4: The uningratiating storm clouds loomed ominously over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The uningratiating smell of burnt popcorn lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The uningratiating painting failed to capture the attention of the viewers.
meanings.sent2: His uningratiating jokes fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The uningratiating flower wilted in the neglected garden.
meanings.sent4: The uningratiating melody grated on her ears like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The uningratiating taste of the bitter medicine made her grimace.

meanings.definition: not likely to win approval or support
meanings.sent1: His uningratiating proposal was met with skepticism by the committee.
meanings.sent2: The uningratiating candidate struggled to gain votes in the election.
meanings.sent3: The uningratiating plan backfired, leaving everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her uningratiating attitude alienated her from her peers.
meanings.sent5: The uningratiating product failed to attract customers despite heavy marketing.
